goal: Figure out how much it would cost to get two 'Carne Asada Burritos' and one 'Chips & Guac' from 'Taco Temple' delivered. Then, draft an email to finance.dept@mycompany.co with the subject 'Lunch Expense Estimate' and state the total cost. Do not place the order.
